overview: An aging actor, trying to make a comeback on Broadway, is surprised when his estranged daughter shows up. It seems that she is an actress and is also trying to make it on Broadway. He tries to re-establish his relationship with her while also trying to hide the fact that she is his daughter from the press.
tagline: Truly Great Entertainment - Great in theme...great in cast...and the great scalawag Charlie McCarthy
title: Letter of Introduction
